g.text: The mapped mesh in the geometry had 12,800 volumetric elements and 1024 nodes. The mesh was
applied uniformly in the sample volume.
The temperature distribution in the heat treatment direction. (
): The mesh used in the FEM simulation
The model was validated comparing the thermal cycle (Figure 18) with CCT curves to predict
the microstructures in the hardened zones of AISI 4130 steel. Based on the CCT diagram, at high
cooling rates (v = 130 °C/s) a martensitic microstructure with retained austenite was observed. The
CCT curve is shown in Figure 19 [46].
Thermal cycle measured in different points along a diameter perpendicular to the direction
